input.sentences: look at how happy i am . my wedding day was just perfect . i 've been dreaming about this day since i was a little girl .
there is my family . they look just as happy as i am !
here is my beautiful husband and i. i love him with all my heart . i want us to be together forever .
i 'm glad that we chose these types of pictures . the photographer did a really great job . we look like we 're in our own world .
this has been the best day of my life . i am so happy . i hope to keep my husband as i am in this moment .
output.sentences: The husband loved with all his heart.
The world has different types of pictures.
This is the moment the husband will remember for the rest of his life.
